It is critical to ensure the voices of the millions of Americans who voted for President Trump are heard and not diminished by voter fraud or election irregularities.

Under President Trump‚Äôs Leadership, we‚Äôve seen unprecedented efforts to protect our southern border, cut taxes for Americans, and confirm a record number of conservative judges to the Federal bench.
I believe the appointment of a commission to study this issue and propose reforms, either at the state or federal level, would be a positive step toward ensuring the integrity of future elections.

Elections are too important to allow significant deviations from state law, and I am hopeful that the process tomorrow will at least shine a bright light on the need to investigate potential wrongdoing and to propose reforms.

In our country, elections are generally governed by the individual states, but there are serious questions about whether, for example, Arizona‚Äôs electors were selected in accordance with the duly enacted laws of the State of Arizona, which is a requirement of the Constitution.
Tomorrow afternoon I will join Senator Ted Cruz in objecting to Electoral College results from Arizona, and I am carefully considering additional states that may require my objection.

Americans deserve to have confidence in the integrity & results of the election.

On Jan 6, I‚Äôll be objecting to the certification of electors in multiple states.

This vote is about ensuring the will of the people is accurately, justly & constitutionally followed.

üí∞ A small dollar matching system and Super PAC restrictions will end the influence of big money in our politics.

Let‚Äôs uplift and amplify citizens‚Äô voices in politics and end big corporate influence. We will make the system work FOR us in a transparent and accessible way.

üó≥ #HR1 provides automatic voter registration for every eligible voter!

Let's remove barriers to voting and increase access to the ballot box, because this is what democracy should look like.

We must protect the democracy we love! 

That‚Äôs why the first bill I will co-sponsor as a Member of Congress is the #ForThePeopleAct. The bill protects our elections so every vote counts and every voice is heard.
